 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַבּוּל‎</span> **noun masculine**<sup>[[Gen.7.6|Gen 7:6]]</sup> ==flood== in time of Noah (Late Hebrew ***id.***; Jewish-Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎מַבּוּלָא‎</span>; Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">; derivation dubious; [[BDB#Thes|Thes]] and others √ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יבל‎</span>, but improbable, see [[BDB#Dl|Dl]]<sup>Prol. 122 f.</sup>; possibly old Assyrian (Babylonian) loan-word (yet form unkn. in Assyrian ), or from √ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נבל‎</span> = Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***nabâlu***</u></abbr>, ***destroy*** [[BDB#Dl|Dl]]<sup>HWB 443 f.</sup>; compare [[BDB#Dl|Dl]]<sup>Par. 156; Prol. 122</sup> [[BDB#Che|Che]]<sup>Psalm 29:10 critical note, Hebraica. iii. 3, 175 f.</sup>, O. Whitehouse<sup>COT ii. 293</sup>); — <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מ‎</span> only Genesis and [[Ps.29.10|Ps 29:10]] always absolute and always with article except [[Gen.9.11|Gen 9:11]]; [[Gen.9.15|Gen 9:15]] — <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיְהִי הַמּ‎</span> [[Gen.17.7|Gen 17:7]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לֹא יִהְיֶה עוֺד מ‎</span> [[Gen.9.11|Gen 9:11]] following by <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַיִם‎</span> as appositive) [[Gen.6.17|Gen 6:17]]; [[Gen.7.6|Gen 7:6]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֵי הַמּ‎</span> [[Gen.7.7|Gen 7:7]]; [[Gen.7.10|Gen 7:10]]; [[Gen.9.11|Gen 9:11]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לֹאיִֿהְיֶה‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עוֺד הַמַּיִם לְמ‎</span> [[Gen.9.15|Gen 9:15]] as epoch, in phrase <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אַחַר הַמּ‎</span> [[Gen.9.28|Gen 9:28]]; [[Gen.10.1|Gen 10:1]]; [[Gen.10.32|Gen 10:32]]; [[Gen.11.10|Gen 11:10]] (strike out as gloss [[BDB#Bu|Bu]] [[BDB#Di|Di]]); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יָשָׁ֑ב‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לַמּ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span> [[Ps.29.10|Ps 29:10]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span> ***at the flood sat enthroned*** (so most; [[BDB#Che|Che]]<sup>see critical note</sup> ***' at the storm '*** (***destruction = destructive storm*** Id<sup>Hebraica. 1.c</sup>.), but <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַמּ‎</span> seems in all the other passages to be almost = proper name of the flood; compare also <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֵי נֹחַ‎</span> [[Isa.54.9|Isa 54:9]] (twice in verse)).
